summary: Serana Visual upgrade. Changes only the appearance of Serana, nothing else.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]STANDALONE MOD[/size]

Im going to improve THIS mod according to feedbacks.

[color=#21cad5]If you dont like her look, dont guess her profession or anything, just leave this page, this mod is not for you.[/color]

[color=#ce2d29]UPDATE:[/color] GOOD NEWS!
Newsea gave me permission to use the sims hair meshes, im so happy, so i added the long hair you can see on the pic to the optional downloads. :-)

Any other feedbacks and recommendations are welcomed.

[size=4][color=#21cad5]I also like seeing your pictures, so feel free to add them.^^[/color][/size]

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/9/a1_2014_3_9_hf130dub6k.jpg[/img] [/center]


[color=#ce2d29][size=5]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/color]

Dawnguard
Skyrim v 1.9.32.0 at least


I know there are a few Serana mods out here, but i really like this character, and i decided to give her my own imagined look.

Installation:

Download via Mod Manager or copy the files into your data folder. Overwrite if asked.


[color=#ce2d29][size=4][b]CREDITS:[/b][/size][/color]


Bethesda for Skyrim

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by apachii
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team and tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by HelloSanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by HelloSanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14539/?]Flans Eyes for Skyrim[/url] by DarNilavu

Special thanks to [color=#f694d0]NewSea[/color], an amazing creator for Sims hairs, who finally replied to my emails and gave me permisson to use the beautiful sims hairs converted by HelloSanta.
Link to NewSea's homepage in ReadMe.

Thank you for your great works and permissions!

RECOMMENDED MODS:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13571/?]DUAL WIELD for Followers by fLokii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?] The Hairstyler by Lycanthrops[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23557/?] Serana - Remove Hood by SONNYSPAK[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28147/?] zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs by zzjay and Grace Darkling[/url]


Other

Currently im working on an asian follower. I accept advices, recommendations, feedbacks.
If you are interested in her, i really would like to use sg hairs (originally created by authors making sims hair meshes, thats why all of them were removed from the nexus), i really would like to get the permission.
But none of the authors reply to my tons of emails ive been sending to them.
Any helps are appreciated and welcomed.
author: kumiiho
